doc.previous: La Prensa is an Argentine daily newspaper
doc.after: Based in Buenos Aires it was founded on 18 October 1869 by Jos C Paz La Prensa ranked among the most widely circulated dailies in Argentina in subsequent decades earning a reputation for conservatism and support for British interests in Argentina Following the election of populist leader Juan Per n La Prensa declined due to both competition from new dailies notably Clar n as well a to government pressure This latter development culminated in the paper s April 1951 seizure by the state and its sale to the CGT labor union
